ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvlraddd.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | mvlraddd.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | mvlraddd.3 | |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) = C ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_pncand | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) - B ) = A ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) - B ) = ( C - B ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> A = ( C - B ) ) |
